name: Gummy Clash
description:
Gummy Clash is a multiplayer 3D platform arena game, where ragdoll gummy characters compete against each other in a real-time shapeshifting stage to try and collect the biggest amount of berries!

This is a 2-4 local multiplayer game. You can use Controllers or Keyboards as input devices. Just click on any button on the Character Selection screen for your character to be added to the brawl.

Try to eat the biggest amount of berries to beat your opponents. Candies provide powerups which you can use to steal berries from the other players.
